cards.name: Age of Progress
cards.text:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)
I — Scry 2.
II — Draw two cards.
III — Spells you cast this turn cost {2} less to cast.

cards.name: Angelfire
cards.text:
Angelfire deals X damage to up to one target.
If only {R} was spent to cast this spell and X is 5 or more, Angelfire deals X damage to each opponent and each creature and planeswalker your opponents control instead.

cards.name: Auros, the Red King
cards.text:
This spell can't be countered.
When Auros enters the battlefield, it deals damage to any target equal to your devotion to red. (Each {R} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to red.)
{R}, Sacrifice Auros, Discard your hand: Draw three cards.

cards.name: Avatar of the Groves
cards.text:
Trample
Avatar of the Groves enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each land you control.
Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players with counters on them, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

cards.name: Awadeh, Lion of the Hajir
cards.text:
This spell can't be countered.
Survivor spells you cast can't be countered.
Whenever a nontoken Survivor enters the battlefield under your control, create a tapped 1/1 Survivor creature token that's all colors.

cards.flavor: In Glacia, wars are won, but rarely do they end.
cards.name: Backup Forces
cards.text: At the beginning of your end step, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token.

cards.flavor: Though he always knew he'd be left alone in the end, he found no pleasure in being right.
cards.name: Banished Companion
cards.text:
Haste
Whenever Banished Companion attacks, it deals 2 damage to you.

cards.artist: Jㅇㅇ d r a w s
cards.name: Barracks Trainer
cards.text:
First strike
Other Soldier creatures you control get +1/+1 and have first strike.
{3}{W}: Create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token.

cards.flavor:
“A true form sought for the harm of the other, rather than for the betterment of the self... I'd rather not dwell on the matter.”
—Doctor Barton
cards.name: Bone Splinters
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Destroy target creature.

cards.name: Borsuppa Roughrider
cards.text: Whenever Borsuppa Roughrider attacks, create a colorless Desert land token named Scoured Path with “{T}: Add {R}.” Sacrifice that token at the beginning of the next end step.

cards.name: Cassia the Carefree
cards.text:
Wander {2}{W}{W} (You may cast this from the battlefield for its wander cost.)
[-1]: Create a 1/1 white Bird creature token with flying or a 2/2 black Cat creature token.
[-2]: If a permanent entering the battlefield under your control this turn causes an ability of a permanent you control to trigger, that ability triggers an additional time.
[-3]: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.

cards.name: Cast Out
cards.text:
Flash
When Cast Out enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until Cast Out leaves the battlefield.
Cycling {W} ({W}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

cards.flavor: The Shield of Caerdyne's convictions inspire more than just stories.
cards.name: Ceanne's Dawnbringer
cards.text: Whenever a Soldier or Knight enters the battlefield under your control, you may sacrifice Ceanne's Dawnbringer. If you do, put your choice of two different counters on that creature from among +1/+1, first strike, lifelink, and vigilance.

cards.name: Clockwork Gaucho
cards.text:
Clockwork Gaucho enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.
Other artifact creatures you control get +1/+1 for each +1/+1 counter on Clockwork Gaucho.
{T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Clockwork Gaucho.

cards.flavor:
“To be a Norwick's hero, your back must be strong enough to carry their hopes.”
—Byron
cards.name: Commoners' Favored
cards.text: Adorned — Commoners' Favored gets +2/+2 as long as it's equipped and/or enchanted.

cards.flavor: “Through me, power. Through me, justice. Through me, vengeance.”
cards.name: Conduit of Rage
cards.text: Ferocious — At the beginning of your precombat main phase, if you control a creature with power 4 or greater, add {R}.

cards.name: Consult on Ages Lost
cards.text:
Create two 1/2 blue Bird creature tokens with flying.
Coalesce {5}{U}{U} (You may cast this from your graveyard for {5}{U}{U}. If you do, put it onto the battlefield as a Horror creature after it resolves. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield or not resolve.)

cards.name: Cramming Student
cards.text:
Prowess
When Cramming Student enters the battlefield, conjure ten cards named Fatigue and shuffle them into your library. (They're colorless sorceries that cost {2} and have “Draw a card.”)
Instant and sorcery spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

cards.name: Crest
cards.text:
Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.
Investigate. (Create a colorless Clue artifact token with “{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)

cards.name: Crippling Apparition
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever an embattled creature you control attacks, tap target creature defending player controls. (A creature is embattled if it has a counter on it or has a permanent you control attached to it.)

cards.name: Dancer of the Great Current
cards.text:
Slipstream (This creature can't be blocked as long as only creatures with slipstream are attacking.)
When Dancer of the Great Current enters the battlefield, tap up to one target creature. If you control two or more other creatures that are Merfolk, Wizards, or Rogues, instead return that creature to its owner's hand and put a +1/+1 counter on Dancer of the Great Current.

cards.name: Danuri Charm
cards.text:
Choose one—
• Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.
• Create two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.
• Creatures you control get +0/+3 and gain reach until end of turn.

cards.flavor: Idle thoughts make for unpredictable mages.
cards.name: Distant Thunder
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card or pay {2}.
Distant Thunder deals 3 damage to any target.

cards.name: Dollmaster
cards.text:
Spirited (When this creature enters the battlefield, you may activate one of its activated abilities without paying its cost.)
{5}{U/B}{U/B}: Gain control of target creature with mana value 3 or less until Dollmaster leaves the battlefield.

cards.flavor: “Countless souls walked this path and met their end. And yet, I can't let their dream die with me.”
cards.name: Doomed Traveler
cards.text: When Doomed Traveler dies, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

cards.name: Dragon's Ire
cards.text:
Dragon's Ire deals 1 damage to any target.
Inscribed creature gets +2/+2.
Inscribe {2}{R} ({2}{R}: Exile this card from your hand inscribed on a creature you control. Whenever that creature attacks, its controller may cast a copy of the inscribed card without paying its mana cost. Inscribe only as a sorcery.)

cards.flavor: Throughout all the conflicts and changes within it, the Duskwood was never left undefended.
cards.name: Duskwood Wildcaller
cards.text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {1}{G}. If you do, create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token.

cards.name: Echoing Knowledge
cards.text:
Draw a card.
Reprise {2} (As you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may exile one card with reprise from your graveyard and pay its reprise cost. If you do, add its effects to that spell.)

cards.flavor: To join Project Reclamation, you need only walk many miles in their shoes.
cards.name: Elvish Skyranger
cards.text: When Elvish Skyranger enters the battlefield, search your library for a card with a basic land type, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

cards.flavor: “The places I've seen you would not believe in a hundred lifetimes.”
cards.name: Elvish Wayfinder
cards.text: Whenever Elvish Wayfinder enters the battlefield or attacks, reveal the top four cards of your library. You may put a land card that doesn't share a name with a land you control into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

cards.name: Envenomed Shuriken
cards.text:
Equipped creature gets +1/+0 and has poisonous 1. (Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player, that player gets a poison counter. A player with ten or more poison counters loses the game.)
Equip {1}

cards.name: Epitome of Force
cards.text:
Haste
Whenever another creature you control enters the battlefield or attacks, Epitome of Force gets +1/+0 until end of turn. If this is the third, sixth, or ninth time this ability has triggered this turn, Epitome of Force gains your choice of first strike, menace, or trample until end of turn.

cards.name: Escorted Ambassador

rulings.text: Escorted Ambassador checks if the permanent was the first nonland, nontoken permanent.

cards.text:
When Escorted Ambassador enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 white Robot Soldier artifact creature tokens.
Whenever a nonland, nontoken permanent enters the battlefield, exile it unless it was the first to enter the battlefield under its controller's control this turn.

cards.flavor:
“As long as the flow of etherium is constant, there is no nothing that we can't achieve.”
—Breya, Etherium Shaper
cards.name: Etherium Sculptor
cards.text: Artifact spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

cards.name: Exergetic Chains
cards.text: When Exergetic Chains enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent you don't control and up to one target creature you control until Exergetic Chains leaves the battlefield.

cards.flavor:
“Our world as barren as the stage”
—Scribbled on the back wall of Laptew's oldest theater
cards.name: Exeunt
cards.text: Each player sacrifices a creature.

cards.flavor:
“Is it a denizen of the primal beyond, or the first of us to journey there and return?”
— Vessifrus, flamekin demagogue
cards.name: Far Wandering Guardian
cards.text:
Flying
Other creatures you control with flying get +1/+1.

cards.name: Faradia's Anointed
cards.text:
Whenever one or more other creatures enter the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life. If at least one of those creatures was a Cleric, you gain 2 life instead.
As long as you have at least 8 life more than your starting life total, other Clerics you control get +1/+1.

cards.name: Fatigue
cards.text: Draw a card.

cards.name: Find Happiness in Misery
cards.text:
Target player mills two cards. You draw a card and you lose 1 life.
Leitmotif (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. When you next cast a spell that shares a color with this card, you may cast this from exile without paying its mana cost.)

cards.name: Flurry of Knives
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may pay {2} and tap an untapped Rogue you control. When you do, copy this spell and you may choose new targets for the copy.
Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.

cards.name: Fox of the Mushroom Forest
cards.text:
Whenever Fox of the Mushroom Forest enters the battlefield or deals combat damage to a player, its activated abilities cost {W} less to activate until your next turn.
{W}, Sacrifice Fox of the Mushroom Forest: Counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays {2}.

cards.name: Fretport Market Smuggler
cards.text:
At the beginning of your end step, choose one at random —
• Create a tapped Treasure token.
• Forebode. (Create a tapped colorless Omen artifact token with “{T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)
• Arm target creature you control. (Create a colorless Equipment artifact token with “Equipped creature gets +1/+0” and equip {2}, then attach it to that creature.)

cards.flavor: In Kahembo's sparse bodies of water, a few lucky outcasts found both shelter and sustenance.
cards.name: Glinthide Hero
cards.text: Prismatic — Whenever you cast a multicolored spell, draw a card.

cards.flavor: Their appearance near Coralight territory is an uncomfortable reminder that not all of Elmare's fauna is docile.
cards.name: Glowfrill Eel
cards.text:
Lifelink
Cycling {B} ({B}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

cards.name: Hail to the Queen

rulings.text: Nonexistant mana costs, such as a face-down creature might have, cannot be paid.

cards.text:
When Hail to the Queen enters the battlefield, each player sacrifices a creature.
Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, you may pay its mana cost. If you do, create a token that's a copy of it.

cards.flavor: Conchport is filled with those who lived a life of suffering before arriving there, and the ways in which they cope vary wildly.
cards.name: Hard Knocks
cards.text: Whenever one or more Rogues you control attack, you may pay 1 life. If you do, draw a card.

cards.name: Heists Most Daring
cards.text:
Rogues and Pirates you control have haste.
Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn.

cards.name: Henros, Royal Herald

rulings.text: Henros checks if the mana value is less than his power, not less than or equal to it.

cards.text:
Whenever you cast a legendary spell or play a legendary land, put a +1/+1 counter on Henros, Royal Herald and you gain 1 life.
{2}{W}: Look at the top six cards of your library. You may exile a legendary card from among them. Then shuffle. If the exiled card has mana value less than Henros's power, you may put it onto the battlefield tapped. If you don't, put it into your hand.

cards.flavor:
“No matter how daunting or draining the task, none have to be made alone.”
—Wei Ji, Dawn and Dusk
cards.name: Herald of the Yaoguai
cards.text: Herald of the Yaoguai has indestructible as long as two or more creatures entered the battlefield under your control this turn.

cards.flavor: No one knows why they collect shiny things.
cards.name: Hoarding Crab
cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, each opponent mills cards equal to the number of card types among permanents you control.

cards.name: Hold Life in Taloned Grasp
cards.text:
Reveal the top three cards of your library. Put up to one creature or Revelation card from among them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
Coalesce {6}{G} (You may cast this from your graveyard for {6}{G}. If you do, put it onto the battlefield as a Horror creature after it resolves. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield or not resolve.)
Hold Life in Taloned Grasp's power is equal to the number of cards in your graveyard.

cards.flavor: “Not everybody who ventures through Vraniveer does so in search of a great reward.”
cards.name: Horizon Wayfarer
cards.text: Horizon Wayfarer's power and toughness are each equal to the number of differently named lands you control.

cards.name: Hyctaleon's Vanguard
cards.text:
Lifelink
When Hyctaleon's Vanguard enters the battlefield, look at the top six cards of your library. You may put a Soldier card with lesser mana value from among them onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
Other Soldiers you control get +1/+1.

cards.flavor: Witnessing one's own legacy while still alive is the privilege of only a select few.
cards.name: Immortalize
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1, has flying and lifelink, and is a legendary artifact in addition to its other types.

cards.flavor: Tzelin knows the name of every demon, and makes sure they all fear hers.
cards.name: Invoking the Name
cards.text: Search your library for a Demon card or a black card with mana value 6 or greater, reveal it, put that card in your hand, then shuffle.

cards.name: Irticull's Vanguard
cards.text:
When Irticull's Vanguard enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until Irticull's Vanguard leaves the battlefield.
Reprocess {1}{W}{W}{W} (Cast a copy of this from your graveyard by exiling it and paying {1}{W}{W}{W}. Spend only mana from differently named sources this way.)

cards.name: Journey Beyond
cards.text: Exile up to one target nonland permanent you control and up to one target nonland permanent card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard. Then return the exiled cards to the battlefield tapped under their owner's control.

cards.name: Justiciar Overseer
cards.text:
Flash
Flying
When Justiciar Overseer enters the battlefield, the next 2 damage that a source of your choice would deal to you and/or permanents you control this turn is dealt to any target instead.

cards.flavor: Left to die on the plane's driest desert, she was reborn in its burning sands.
cards.name: Kamata, Ruby Ascendant
cards.text:
Flying, haste
Ward—Pay 3 life.
The first Dragon spell you cast each turn costs {R}{R} less to cast. (This can reduce the amount of generic mana you pay.)

cards.name: Kantra of Bounty
cards.text:
Enspirit (As you cast this spell, you may exile a nonenchantment creature you control until this leaves the battlefield or fails to resolve. Reduce this spell's cost by the exiled card's mana value.)
You may play any number of lands on each of your turns.

cards.name: Keeper of Secret Havens

cards.flavor:
“Joy unto life, life unto joy.”
—His Holiness Jorah
cards.name: Keeper of the Sanctum
cards.text: Whenever you gain life for the first time each turn, create a 1/1 white Cleric creature token.

cards.flavor:
“He gave up the peace of death to protect the chaos of our lives.”
—Tobias, Priest of Vaea
cards.name: Kotis, Promised General
cards.text:
Other creatures you control get +1/+1.
When Kotis, Promised General dies, you may return it to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Krahen, Dusk's Call
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever an opponent discards a card, you may exile it. If you do, create a 1/1 black Bird creature token with flying and “This creature can't block.”
{B}, Sacrifice three Birds: You may cast a card exiled with Krahen, Dusk's Call without paying its mana cost.

cards.name: Last of the Poisonblades
cards.text:
Deathtouch
Vanishing 4 (This creature enters the battlefield with four time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.)

cards.name: Live in Harmony
cards.text: Reveal the top five cards of your library. Put a creature or enchantment card from among them into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

cards.flavor: The gift of life is most meaningful from those who know it the best.
cards.name: Llanowar Exemplar
cards.text:
Each other creature you control that's an Elf or a Warrior gets +1/+1.
{2}, Sacrifice Llanowar Exemplar: Creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn.

cards.flavor: Never below as above.
cards.name: Lofty Denial
cards.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}. If you control a creature with flying, counter that spell unless its controller pays {4} instead.

cards.name: Lord Xander, Curator
cards.text:
(Transcend as a sorcery to gain that type and a +1/+1 counter.)
Lifelink
Demon spells you cast cost {B} less to cast and an additional 2 life to cast.
{3}{B/R}{B/R}: Demon
Discard your hand. Draw a number of cards equal to the greatest power among Demons you control.
{5}{U/B}{U/B}: Noble
Gain control of target creature. You lose life equal to its mana value.

cards.flavor: Sown by druids, nurtured by faeries.
cards.name: Loresprout

rulings.text: Loresprout's ability checks if you control another creature as it triggers and as it tries to resolve.

cards.text: When Loresprout enters the battlefield, if you control another creature, draw a card.

cards.name: Luminal Lifethreader
cards.text:
Changeling (This card is every creature type.)
{1}: Another target creature you control gains the creature type of your choice until end of turn.
{1}: Change the text of another target creature you control by replacing all instances of one creature type with the creature type of your choice until end of turn.

cards.name: Majesty of Nature
cards.text:
Creatures you control get +2/+2.
Wanderlust — As long as you control four or more differently named lands, creatures you control have trample and can't be blocked by more than one creature.

cards.name: Make Art Not Friends

rulings.text: If the Golem has any other card types, it will retain them as a Golem.

cards.text:
(Choose only one work as a sorcery to add its abilities)
When Make Art Not Friends enters the battlefield, create a Treasure token.
{1}{R}: Never Again
Whenever you sacrifice an artifact, that artifact deals 1 damage to each opponent.
{4}{R}{R}: Over It All
At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may have an artifact you control become a 6/6 Golem artifact creature until end of turn.

cards.name: Manipulator of Waves
cards.text:
Slipstream (This creature can't be blocked as long as only creatures with slipstream are attacking.)
Whenever Manipulator of Waves attacks, mill three cards. Then create a 0/0 blue Elemental Serpent creature token with “This creature gets +1/+1 for each five cards in your graveyard.”

cards.name: Marilye, Heirloom Pilferer
cards.text:
Deception {2}{U}{U} ({2}{U}{U}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.)
As long as it's your turn, Marilye is a 3/2 Elf Rogue creature with hexproof and indestructible.
[+1]: Tap target permanent. It doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
[-2]: Exile the top five cards of target opponent's library. You may cast any number of cards exiled this way with total mana value less than or equal to the amount of damage dealt to them this turn without paying their mana costs.

cards.flavor:
“When in High and Dry, assume everyone you meet is out to kill you until proven otherwise. At least thrice.”
—Captain Ripley Vance
cards.name: Maritime Thug
cards.text: Whenever Maritime Thug becomes tapped, it deals 1 damage to each opponent.

cards.name: Master of the Abyss
cards.text:
When Master of the Abyss enters the battlefield, draw two cards, then discard a card.
{2}{U}{U}, {T}, Discard two cards: Create an X/X black Horror creature token, where X is the number of cards in your graveyard.

cards.flavor: “Craft every blade as if it was the only memory that will remain of you.”
cards.name: Masterwork Artisan
cards.text:
Equipment spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
Equip abilities you activate cost {1} less.

cards.name: Maven of Fear
cards.text:
When Maven of Fear enters the battlefield, mill two cards.
Maven of Fear gets +2/+1 and has menace as long as six or more cards are in your graveyard.

cards.name: Mawdryk's Harrier
cards.text:
Reach
When Mawdryk's Harrier enters the battlefield, look at the top six cards of your library. You may put an Elf card with lesser mana value from among them onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
Other Elves you control get +1/+1.

cards.flavor:
“The path to glory is simple: make sure that no one survives your conviction but you.”
—Aelwen, Crimson Battleguard
cards.name: Militant Youth
cards.text: Whenever you gain life, Militant Youth gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

cards.flavor:
“Flesh and bone are of no use when exploring infinite potential.”
—Aurora, Soulweaver
cards.name: Mirrorsoul Mage
cards.text:
Prowess
Whenever you cast your first noncreature spell during each of your turns, create a 1/1 blue Reflection Wizard creature token with prowess.

cards.flavor: True beauty is quite a dangerous thing.
cards.name: Mistress of the Black Orchid
cards.text:
Poisonous 1 (Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, that player gets a poison counter. A player with ten or more poison counters loses the game.)
At the beginning of your upkeep, if an opponent is poisoned, you draw a card, you lose 1 life, and you get a poison counter.

cards.name: Miyoga Dragonsoul

rulings.text: Miyoga Dragonsoul's type becomes "Creature - Dragon", overwriting any other type changes.

cards.text:
Dragon spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
{1}{R}: Until end of turn, Miyoga Dragonsoul becomes a 2/2 red Dragon creature with flying and “{R}: Miyoga Dragonsoul gets +1/+0 until end of turn.” Activate only as a sorcery.

changes: 2024-05-01 — Was 1/1 with "Mob Rallier and other creatures you control get +X/+X, where X is the number of creatures you control."
cards.flavor:
“They're fighting for themselves, not for their masters. Leave them be.”
—Slaug, Ironpact commander
cards.name: Mob Rallier
cards.text: Other creatures you control get +2/+2.

cards.flavor:
“No, no, it doesn't matter what I saw. What matters is I was seen.”
—Ravik, Still-Smoke Seer
cards.name: Moonlit Pursuit
cards.text: Target creature you control gains indestructible until end of turn if it has a +1/+1 counter on it. Then it fights target creature you don't control.

cards.name: Moranai Survivalist
cards.text:
Moranai Survivalist enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it if you didn't cast it from your hand.
Revive {3}{G}{G} ({3}{G}{G}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create a token that's a copy of it except it has no mana cost. Revive only as a sorcery.)

cards.flavor: From one adventure to the next.
cards.name: New Divide
cards.text:
As New Divide enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}, Sacrifice New Divide: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

cards.flavor:
Kissed by Fahrib
—Alkabah expression meaning “was killed in their sleep”
cards.name: Nightly Raid
cards.text: Destroy target creature. Recruit. (Create a 0/0 white Soldier Army creature token, then put a +1/+1 counter on each Army you control.)

cards.name: Nirami, Ema's Keeper
cards.text: Whenever an opponent discards a card, exile it. You may cast that card as long for as it remains exiled, and you may spend black mana as though it were mana of any color to cast that spell.

cards.name: Oriq Soulweaver

rulings.text: Oriq Soulweaver checks the mana cost printed in the top right of the card, regardless of what cost was spent to cast the spell.

If a split card is cast, consider all of the faces being cast. For example, casting Flotsam (mana cost {U}) will not trigger Oriq Soulweaver, and casting Jetsam (mana cost {B}{B} or fusing Flotsam//Jetsam (mana cost {U}{B}{B}) will have X = 2.

cards.text:
Whenever you cast a black spell, choose up to X, where X is the number of black mana symbols in that spell's mana cost —
• Target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
• Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.
• You draw a card and you lose 3 life.
• Exile target card in a graveyard.

cards.name: Overclock

rulings.text: Copied spells aren't cast unless the effect explicitly says they are.

cards.text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, copy it. You may choose new targets for the copy. Overclock deals X damage to you, where X is the number of spells you've cast this turn.

cards.flavor: The gods resent that mortals can create, too.
cards.name: Paint with Starflame
cards.text:
Choose one —
• Paint with Starflame deals 3 damage to target player or planeswalker. Scry 1.
• Create a 2/2 red Elemental Shaman creature token with haste and “Whenever this creature attacks, scry 1.”

cards.name: Paladin's Attendant
cards.text:
Encourage ({T}: Another target creature you control gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Encourage only as a sorcery.)
Whenever Paladin's Attendant encourages a creature, that creature gains first strike until end of turn.

cards.name: Pay Up
cards.text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. If you can't, they discard a card. Otherwise, that player discards a card, then if they didn't discard the chosen card, you create a tapped Treasure token.

cards.flavor: “We're all here to kill each other. I'm simply the most honest one about it.”
cards.name: Philosophy of Fire
cards.text: Whenever a source you control deals damage to an opponent this turn, exile the top card of your library. You may play it this turn.

cards.name: Price of Wisdom
cards.text:
Draw two cards, then discard two cards. Then if you cast Price of Wisdom from your graveyard, create a 3/3 blue Sphinx creature token with flying.
Flashback {4}{U}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

cards.name: Prized Holsteins
cards.text:
When Prized Holsteins enters the battlefield, create a 2/2 white Dwarf creature token.
When Prized Holsteins leaves the battlefield, you gain 2 life.

cards.name: Prophecy of Peace
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block.
Foresee — As you draw Prophecy of Peace, you may reveal it and pay {W}. When you do, target creature can't attack or block this turn.

cards.flavor:
“After being plugged into the grid for more than a day, you start to feel like words can only do harm.”
—Fletcher, AOSE Technician
cards.name: Psychic Grid
cards.text:
Defender
Whenever you cast a spell during an opponent's turn, scry 1.

cards.name: Pupil of Lightning
cards.text:
Haste
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Pupil of Lightning gets +1/+1 until end of turn. If you cast that spell from your graveyard, put a +1/+1 counter on it instead.

changes: 2023-11-01 — Now costs {2}{U}{U} (from {1}{U}{U}) and has flash instead of ward {2}.
cards.name: Qililia's Scavenger
cards.text:
Flash
When Qililia's Scavenger enters the battlefield, look at the top six cards of your library. You may put a Merfolk card with lesser mana value from among them onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
Other Merfolk you control get +1/+1.

cards.flavor:
“Soon you'll see that you can't go into the fire without setting your heart ablaze.”
—Auros, Flame-Cursed
cards.name: Rabid Thrill
cards.text:
Creatures you control get +2/+0.
Whenever a creature you control is dealt damage, it deals that much damage to you.

cards.flavor:
“So this is your legacy, huh?”
—Kari Zev
cards.name: Ragavan, Most Wanted
cards.text:
As long as you control two or more other Pirates, Ragavan has haste.
Whenever one or more Pirates you control deal combat damage to a player, create a tapped Treasure token.

cards.flavor:
“A young giant can only be calmed down with a drum as loud as its progenitor or a song as beautiful as the dawn.”
—The Book Of Other Folk
cards.name: Rampant Giantling
cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, mill two cards.

cards.name: Ravenous Hydra
cards.text:
Ravenous Hydra enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.
Whenever Ravenous Hydra deals combat damage, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players with counters on them, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

changes: 2022-05-01 — Now investigates instead of creating a Treasure token.
2024-02-01 — Now only investigates if you control a legendary permanent.
cards.flavor: “It's not about being perfect, it's about knowing your imperfections.”
cards.name: Ready for Anything
cards.text:
Scry 2, then draw a card.
If you control a legendary permanent, investigate. (Create a colorless Clue artifact token with “{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)

cards.name: Relic Hoarder
cards.text:
Relic Hoarder gets +1/+0 for each artifact and/or enchantment you control.
Relic Hoarder has first strike as long as you control three or more artifacts and/or enchantments.

cards.flavor:
“The hardest step in the road to wisdom is understanding how little we truly know.”
—Mithel, Maktali Archivist
cards.name: Rune-Scribe's Apprentice
cards.text: When Rune-Scribe's Apprentice enters the battlefield, target player mills four cards.

cards.flavor:
“They say death will only bring more death, but they say nothing when death stays with us alone.”
—Scarhide, Arsenal Crafter
cards.name: Ruthless Blademaster
cards.text:
First strike
Ruthless Blademaster gets +1/+0 for each Equipment attached to it.

cards.name: Sear, Forged of Lava

changes: 2024-05-01 — Changed from instant to sorcery. Reprise cost changed from {1}{U} to {2}{U}.
cards.name: Secrets of Coralight Court
cards.text:
This spell can't be countered.
Draw a card.
Reprise {2}{U} (As you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may exile one card with reprise from your graveyard and pay its reprise cost. If you do, add its effects to that spell.)

cards.name: Senaturian Centurion
cards.text: When you cast Senaturian Centurion, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a creature card with mana value 2 or less. Copy that card, then put the revealed card into your hand. You may cast the copy without paying its mana cost. Put the revealed cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.

cards.name: Senaturian Legion

rulings.text: An EDH deck can also have any number of creatures named Senaturian Legion.

cards.text:
Senaturian Legion gets +1/+1 for each other creature on the battlefield named Senaturian Legion.
A deck can have any number of cards named Senaturian Legion.

cards.flavor: On ever plane she visits, she designs a place to rest, recuperate, and simply enjoy true nature.
cards.name: Simul's Grove
cards.text:
Whenever you create one or more non-Mutant creature tokens, choose one —
• Create a 0/0 green Plant Mutant creature token, then put a +1/+1 counter on it for each of those non-Mutant tokens.
• Draw a card.

cards.name: Sinister Charm
cards.text:
Choose one —
• Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains lifelink until end of turn.
• Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.
• Scry 1, then draw a card.

cards.name: Social Graces
cards.text:
Bleed {0} (You may cast this spell for its bleed cost if an opponent has lost life this turn.)
Look at target player's hand.
Draw a card.

cards.name: Sprawled Arming
cards.text:
Enchant creature
When Sprawled Arming enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature has first strike.
{5}: Return Sprawled Arming to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Steward of Second Sphere
cards.text:
You may reveal the second card you draw each turn as you draw it. When you do, create a 2/2 blue Avatar Wizard creature token with prowess if it's a creature card. If it's a land card, create a Treasure token. If it's a noncreature, nonland card, Steward of Second Sphere can't be blocked this turn.
{3}{W/U}{W/U}: Scry 2.

cards.flavor: Sometimes you can hear it breathe.
cards.name: Strange Jungle
cards.text: Search your library for two basic land cards and put them onto the battlefield tapped. Then they become 0/1 green Plants with “This creature can't block” in addition to their other colors, types, and abilities.

cards.name: Straw Simulacrum
cards.text:
As Straw Simulacrum enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.
Straw Simulacrum is the chosen creature type in addition to its other types.
Other creatures you control of the chosen type get +1/+1.

cards.name: Synchronous Battle Armor
cards.text:
Synchronous Battle Armor and equipped creature get +1/+1 for each artifact you control.
Whenever equipped creature attacks, tap up to three target creatures.
Reconfigure {3}{U}{U} ({3}{U}{U}: Attach to target creature you control; or unattach from a creature. Reconfigure only as a sorcery. While attached, this isn't a creature.)

cards.flavor: “Countless days I have lived this life, and just as many have I learned something I did not know the day before.”
cards.name: Syncretic Master
cards.text: When Syncretic Master enters the battlefield, look at the top X cards of your library, where X is the number of basic land types among lands you control. Put one them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.

cards.name: Temur Falconer
cards.text:
When Temur Falconer enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 blue Bird creature token with flying.
Whenever a creature you control with flying deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, put a +1/+1 counter on Temur Falconer.

cards.name: The Pyleas, Siona's Pride
cards.text:
Whenever The Pyleas, Siona's Pride enters the battlefield or attacks, look at the top six cards of your library. You may reveal a legendary non-Vehicle card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
Crew 2

cards.name: The Terror of Shady Cove
cards.text:
Deathtouch
When The Terror of Shady Cove enters the battlefield, target opponent sacrifices an artifact. If they can't, create a 3/3 green Slug creature token with deathtouch. Then repeat this process for an enchantment and a nonbasic land.

cards.name: Thought Siphon
cards.text:
Whenever you draw a card, you may have target opponent exile the top card of their library face down.
You may look at and play cards exiled with Thought Siphon, and you may spend blue mana as though it were mana of any color to cast them.

cards.name: Tip the Scales
cards.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield, then destroy target creature an opponent controls that doesn't share a creature type with it.

cards.flavor: The naga of Mautakesh need only one bite to kill, but few settle for that little.
cards.name: Touch of the Coil
cards.text:
Target player gets a poison counter.
Draw a card.

changes: 2023-04-01 — Has been tweaked so it checks if the spell it is casting is a green creature or Revelation. This means it can no longer cast Adventures, but can cast cards that aren't green creatures/Revelations that can be green creature/Revelation spells (such as through modal double faced cards or Painter's Servant.)
cards.name: Tower Over The Sky
cards.text:
Search your library for a card. You may cast it without paying its mana cost if it's a green creature or Revelation spell with mana value X or less. Then shuffle.
Coalesce {X}{X}{G}{G}{G}{G} (You may cast this from your graveyard for {X}{X}{G}{G}{G}{G}. If you do, put it onto the battlefield as a Horror creature after it resolves. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield or not resolve.)

cards.name: Treacherous Warden

rulings.text: Treacherous Warden does not trigger on creatures that were cast from a graveyard, as they entered the battlefield from the stack.

cards.text:
When Treacherous Warden enters the battlefield, search your library for a card, put into your graveyard, then shuffle.
Whenever a creature enters the battlefield from your graveyard, each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

cards.name: Unending Slime
cards.text:
Unending Slime enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.
{2}{G}{G}{G}: Return Unending Slime from your graveyard to your hand.

changes: 2023-11-01 — Cost reduction now checks if you have forty extra cards (from twenty).
cards.name: Unrivaled Fireweaver
cards.text:
This spell costs {2} less to cast if your starting deck contained at least forty cards more than the minimum deck size.
When Unrivaled Fireweaver enters the battlefield, you may exile a red instant or sorcery card you own from outside the game. Until the end of your next turn, you may play that card.

cards.name: Visions of Sand and Steel
cards.text:
Whenever you attack, create a white Equipment artifact token with “Equipped creature gets +1/+1” and equip {1}. Attach it to an attacking creature you control.
At the beginning of your end step, untap each embattled creature you control. (A creature is embattled if it has a counter on it or has a permanent you control attached to it.)

changes: 2024-02-01 — Now uses 'is no longer on the battlefield' wording instead of 'leaves the battlefield'
cards.name: Voliv Ritualist

rulings.text: This creates a land named Plains Island Token, Island Swamp Token, Swamp Mountain Token, Mountain Forest Token, Forest Plains Token, Plains Swamp, Island Mountain Token, Swamp Forest Token, Mountain Plains Token, or Forest Island Token.

cards.text: When Voliv Ritualist enters the battlefield, choose two different basic land types. Create a tapped colorless land token that's the chosen types. When Voliv Ritualist is no longer on the battlefield, sacrifice a land.

cards.name: Wardbane Mystic
cards.text:
Whenever you cast an Elf spell, create a 1/1 green Elf Druid creature token.
Tap four untapped Druids you control: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

cards.name: Warden of Distortion

rulings.text: If Warden of Distortion is dying from some manner that being indestructible will not save it from (such as by getting -4/-4 or by being sacrificed), its controller will be able to exile a creature card to make it a copy, but it will still die immediately after. Any triggers will see it die as whatever it copied.

cards.text:
Flying
If Warden of Distortion would die, you may exile a creature card from your graveyard. If you do, Warden of Distortion becomes a copy of that creature, except it's a 4/4 Nightmare Dragon and it has flying and this ability. It gains indestructible until end of turn.

cards.flavor:
“You can wonder what you might have done with just one more spell—but I have better things to do than waiting to lose.”
—Jessica Turin, Battlemage
cards.name: Way of Water
cards.text: Counter up to one target spell unless its controller pays {2}. Until end of turn, you may cast spells as though they had flash.

cards.name: Whimsy
cards.text:
Whenever you draw a card, target player mills two cards.
Whenever you cast a blue spell, scry 1, then you may reveal the top card of your library. If it's an instant or sorcery card, draw a card.

cards.name: Whispered Breath
cards.text:
This spell costs {2} less to cast if it targets a creature or planeswalker card with mana value 3 or less.
Return target creature or planeswalker card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

cards.name: Will of the Wilds
cards.text:
Choose one —
• Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature you control.
• Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

cards.name: Winmeari, Glorian Defector

rulings.text: Winmeari's emblem does not force creatures to attack, but if an opponent's creature is declared as an attacker, it must be attacking a Winmeari planeswalker if there is one on the battlefield that creature can legally attack.

cards.text:
[+1]: Until end of turn, Winmeari, Glorian Defector becomes a 5/5 Warrior creature with lifelink that's still a planeswalker. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to her this turn.
[0]: Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
[-1]: You get an emblem with “Attacking creatures your opponents control must attack a Winmeari planeswalker if able.”

cards.flavor: In this cruel world, we must do what must be done in to order to survive, even if that's the wrong thing.
cards.name: Yri, the Daring Blade
cards.text: Whenever Yri, the Daring Blade and exactly one other creature attack, Yri and that creature can't be blocked by creatures with mana value 3 or less this turn.
